Class Question

java.lang.Object
uwi.comp3607.jeopardy.model.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a single Jeopardy question.

A question has a category, a point value, the question text, four multiple-choice options (Aâ€“D), and a correct answer key. It also tracks whether the question has already been used in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String category, int value, String questionText, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String correctAnswer)
      Constructs a new question with all required data.
      Parameters:
      category - the question category
      value - the point value for this question
      questionText - the text of the question
      optionA - option A text
      optionB - option B text
      optionC - option C text
      optionD - option D text
      correctAnswer - the correct answer key ("A", "B", "C", or "D")

    • isUsed

      public boolean isUsed()
      Indicates whether this question has been used in the game.
      Returns:
      true if the question has already been asked

    • markUsed

      public void markUsed()
      Marks this question as used so it cannot be selected again.
